wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Morrison (born 30 June 1983) is an English actor who has performed in theatre, TV and film. He is best known for his appearances in On the Shore of the Wide World and as Scripps in Cast B and C of Alan Bennett's The History Boys. working alongside Steven Webb and Matt Smith.

response: * Thomas Morrison as Danny Holden; Ripley and Natalie's troubled and awkward son, who is constantly belittled by his father.

response: *Thomas Morrison - Actor (who played the role of Hooper in the recent adaptation of Brideshead Revisited)
